title: Sun in Capricorn
summary: A season emphasizing responsibility, structure, and long-range thinking. Attention turns toward durability over speed and results that can be sustained. The opportunity is to work deliberately with limits rather than pushing past them.

meaning.headline: Focus shifts toward responsibility and long-term outcomes.

frames.text: Sun in Capricorn places emphasis on responsibility, structure, and practical progress over time.
This period favors measured effort, accountability, and decisions that hold up under scrutiny.
Momentum builds through consistency rather than speed.
Limits and constraints become clearer, offering guidance rather than restriction.
This means success requires struggle or self-denial.

frictions: Treating seriousness as the only valid tone

do: Work within clear boundaries rather than fighting them.
Prioritize tasks that benefit from long-term effort.
Take responsibility for pacing and sustainability.

reusable_lines.text: Progress now favors consistency over speed.
Structure can be a support, not a constraint.

forbidden_claims: Framing hardship as required for growth
allowed_framing: Agency-forward framing: 'you can choose how to work with limits…'
